info.title: Quantra Pricing API
info.description:
## QuantLib-powered Financial Instrument Pricing API

Quantra provides a high-performance JSON HTTP API for pricing financial instruments using the QuantLib library.

### Supported Products

| Product | Endpoint | Description |
|---------|----------|-------------|
| Fixed Rate Bond | `/price-fixed-rate-bond` | Price fixed coupon bonds |
| Floating Rate Bond | `/price-floating-rate-bond` | Price floating rate notes |
| Vanilla Swap | `/price-vanilla-swap` | Price interest rate swaps |
| FRA | `/price-fra` | Price forward rate agreements |
| Cap/Floor | `/price-cap-floor` | Price interest rate caps and floors |
| Swaption | `/price-swaption` | Price swaptions |
| CDS | `/price-cds` | Price credit default swaps |
| Bootstrap Curves | `/bootstrap-curves` | Bootstrap yield curves and extract rates |

### Quick Start

```bash
# Health check
curl http://localhost:8080/health

# Price a fixed rate bond
curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/price-fixed-rate-bond \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d @examples/data/fixed_rate_bond_request.json
```

tags.name: Bonds
tags.description: Fixed and floating rate bond pricing

tags.name: Curves
tags.description: Yield curve bootstrapping and rate extraction

post.description: Calculate NPV, clean/dirty price, yield, duration, and convexity for fixed coupon bonds.
Calculate NPV and analytics for floating rate notes with IBOR index linkage.
Calculate NPV and fair rate for fixed-for-floating interest rate swaps.
Calculate NPV and forward rate for FRAs.
Calculate NPV for interest rate caps, floors, and collars using Black model.
Calculate NPV for European swaptions using Black model.
Calculate NPV and fair spread for CDS contracts.
Bootstrap yield curves from market instruments and extract discount factors, zero rates, and forward rates on a specified grid of dates.

get.description: Check if the API server is running.

quantra_IndexDef.description: Complete index definition. Registered once per request, referenced by id.

name.description:
Human-readable name / family label (e.g., "Euribor", "SOFR", "MyBank3M")
Used as the QuantLib index familyName. No financial logic depends on this.

tenor_number.description:
Tenor period (e.g., 6 Months for Euribor 6M, 0 for overnight)
For overnight indices, set tenor_number=0.

fixing_days.description: Fixing days (e.g., 2 for Euribor, 0 for SOFR/ESTR)

end_of_month.description: End of month rule (IBOR only, ignored for overnight)

currency.description:
ISO currency code (e.g., "EUR", "USD", "GBP", "JPY")
Mapped to QuantLib Currency objects. Required.

fixings.description:
Past fixings needed for seasoned instruments.
Applied via index->addFixing() before pricing.

quantra_IndexRef.description:
Reference to an IndexDef by its id.
Used by helpers and instruments to point to a registered index.

fx_spot_quote_id.description: FX spot quote reference for FX-implied curve helpers.

quote_id.description: Optional: reference a shared quote by id instead of inline rate

futures_price.description: Futures price (e.g. 95.25); if set, rate is ignored

convexity_adjustment.description: Convexity adjustment added to implied rate

price.description: Bond price (preferred over rate for clarity)

date.description: Maturity date for the zero rate (YYYY-MM-DD)

quantra_Tenor.description: A tenor as a structured {n, unit} pair that maps directly to QuantLib::Period.

quantra_TenorGrid.description: Tenors relative to the curve reference date (or as_of_date if no reference date).

quantra_RangeGrid.description: Sample the curve between start/end with a step.

quantra_BootstrapCurvesRequest.description: Request to bootstrap multiple yield curves.

as_of_date.description: Valuation date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY/MM/DD) for evaluationDate().

indices.description:
Index definitions needed by curve helpers (SwapHelper, OISHelper, etc.)
Every IndexRef in helpers must resolve to an IndexDef here.

quantra_VolSurfaceSpec.description: Volatility surface specification - referenced by id in trade requests

quantra_QuoteSpec.description:
Market quote (spot price, FX rate, etc.)
Used by: Pricing.quotes[], helper quote_id references

quantra_EquityVanillaModelSpec.description: Equity vanilla option pricing model specification (future)

quantra_ModelSpec.description: Model specification - references by id in trade requests

settlement_date.description: Settlement date (YYYY-MM-DD). Used by: FixedRateBond, FloatingRateBond

indices.description:
Index definitions. Used by: ALL floating-rate instruments and curve helpers.
Every IndexRef in the request must resolve to an IndexDef here.

curves.description: Yield curves for discounting/forwarding. Used by: ALL

credit_curves.description: Credit curves for CDS pricing. Used by: CDS

quotes.description: Market quotes (spot prices, FX rates). Used by: EquityOption (future)

vol_surfaces.description: Volatility surfaces (typed by product family). Used by: CapFloor, Swaption, EquityOption

models.description: Pricing models/engines (typed by product family). Used by: CapFloor, Swaption, CDS, EquityOption

bond_pricing_details.description: Include bond analytics (duration, convexity). Used by: FixedRateBond, FloatingRateBond

bond_pricing_flows.description: Include cash flow details. Used by: FixedRateBond, FloatingRateBond

coupon_pricers.description: Coupon pricers for floating legs. Used by: FloatingRateBond, VanillaSwap

grid_dates.description: The realized grid (dates) used for sampling (YYYY-MM-DD).

series.description: Series returned, each aligned to grid_dates.

pillar_dates.description:
Bootstrapped pillar dates from the curve instruments (YYYY-MM-DD).
Useful for debugging to see where the curve "nodes" are.
May be empty if pillar extraction is not supported for the curve type.

quantra_BootstrapCurvesResponse.description: Response containing results for all requested curves.
